metadata.synopsis: A one-liner for a flaming fist patroling the Wyrm's Rock fortress roof.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, talk to a patroling flaming fist at Wyrm's Rock fortress roof, -27; 60; 187.

0.speaker: Fist Diallo
0.text: I don't like trouble - so don't go causing any.

1.speaker: Fist Diallo
1.text: You're being watched. Remember that before you do something foolish.
